title: Fix Broken HTML Structure
description:
This HTML page has several errors. Fix them to create valid HTML.

## Problems to Fix

1. Missing DOCTYPE declaration
2. Incorrect tag nesting (tags closed in wrong order)
3. Missing closing tags
4. Unclosed attribute quotes

## Tips

- Tags must be closed in the reverse order they were opened
- All attribute values should be in quotes
- Every opening tag needs a matching closing tag (except self-closing elements)
